page.title: 02WINTERINGHAM HOBBIES
page.content: Most of the residents are proud of their gardens which makes the village picturesque. Proximity to the Humber with a safe haven means many people have an interest in{boats.}Apart from pets there are more than 12 livestock hobbyists, their interests ranging from {pigs, geese }and {ducks}to{cage {birds, fish, pigeons }and {bees. Dogs are trained to the gun and for police work.{Soft fabrics}are used for making {toys, patchwork, rugs, knitwear}and {lace.}There are at least four hobby {painters}and an equal number whose interest is in fine{woodwork. Shooting and {fishing }have a large following, the latter both in the salt water of the Humber and in the artificial ponds that have been excavated in the centre of the village and on the outskirts.
